item.title: Need help with this code
item.dc:creator: @_E1 [E]
item.description:
@_E1 wrote:

Hello everyone…

I recently added this code…

public void writePlayers() { int players = PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount(); sendFrame126("@yel@Evilscape!", 6570); sendFrame126("@gre@Players Online: " + players, 6572); SimpleDateFormat sdf = new SimpleDateFormat("MMM dd hh:mm"); String date = sdf.format(new Date()); sendFrame126("@red@" + date, 6664); setInterfaceWalkable(6673); }

Which basically adds the server name, players online, and the date of the host computer, on a top line of the screen.

Anyway, to the point, When I enter in the wilderness, my wilderness sign does not appear. It appears for a half a second, while moving into another wilderness level…

I know the problem is the "setInterfaceWalkable(####); part, but I’m not sure what to set it to. I’ve tried a few different random numbers, only to find I et the lovely T2 error :mad:

So, What should I do? [br][size=1]Posted on: July 05, 2007, 08:23:25 PM[/size][hr]anyone

Read full topic
